20 /** A code generator that emits GPU code from a given Halide stmt. */
21 template<typename CodeGen_CPU>
22 class CodeGen_GPU_Host : public CodeGen_CPU {
23 public:
24  /** Create a GPU code generator. GPU target is selected via
25  * CodeGen_GPU_Options. Processor features can be enabled using the
26  * appropriate flags from Target */

32  /** Declare members of the base class that must exist to help the
33  * compiler do name lookup. Annoying but necessary, because the
34  * compiler doesn't know that CodeGen_CPU will in fact inherit
35  * from CodeGen for every instantiation of this template. */
